settings.name: Your message
settings.description: You can personalize the app by providing a file.

settings.name: My auxiliary zipfile
settings.description: Files for running the XY analysis. The App expects a zipped file set with the extension: 1. `.cpg`, 2. `.dbf`, 3. `.prj`, 4. `.shp`, 5. `.shx`.

settings.name: The year
settings.description: Enter the year for which you want to keep the data

references.note: Darwin, C. 1900. The creation. Journal XY. 1-2
